extends BaseConditionsObject

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HodoscopeChannel.GeometryId
      The GeometryId contains the x and y indices of the crystal in the LCSIM-based geometry representation.

      Specifies a scintillator that is positioned on the bottom half of the hodoscope.

      Specifies the scintillator fiber optic bundle hole that is closest to the calorimeter center.
      static int HOLE_NULL
      Specifies that a scintillator has only one fiber optic bundle hole.

        Specifies a scintillator that is positioned on the top half of the hodoscope.

        public static final int BOTTOM
        Specifies a scintillator that is positioned on the bottom half of the hodoscope.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAYER_1

        public static final int LAYER_1
        Specifies a scintillator that is positioned on the first hodoscope layer - i.e. the layer closest to the target.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAYER_2

        public static final int LAYER_2
        Specifies a scintillator that is positioned on the second hodoscope layer - i.e. the layer farthest from the target.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOLE_LOW_X

        public static final int HOLE_LOW_X
        Specifies the scintillator fiber optic bundle hole that is closest to the calorimeter center.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOLE_HIGH_X

        public static final int HOLE_HIGH_X
        Specifies the scintillator fiber optic bundle hole that is closest to the positron-side of the calorimeter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOLE_NULL

        public static final int HOLE_NULL
        Specifies that a scintillator has only one fiber optic bundle hole.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        the geometry ID

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Overrides:
        equals in class BaseConditionsObject

      • isBottom

        public boolean isBottom()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator is located on the bottom half of the hodoscope.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the scintillator is on the bottom half and false otherwise.

      • isLayer1

        public boolean isLayer1()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator is located on layer 1 of the hodoscope.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the scintillator is on layer 1 and false otherwise.

      • isLayer2

        public boolean isLayer2()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator is located on layer 2 of the hodoscope.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the scintillator is on layer 2 and false otherwise.

      • isMultiHoleScintillator

        public boolean isMultiHoleScintillator()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator channel belongs to a scintillator with multiple FADC channel.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the channel belongs to a multi-channel scintillator and otherwise returns false.

      • isSingleHoleScintillator

        public boolean isSingleHoleScintillator()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator channel belongs to a scintillator with only one FADC channel.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the channel belongs to a single-channel scintillator and otherwise returns false.

      • isTop

        public boolean isTop()
        Indicates whether or not this scintillator is located on the top half of the hodoscope.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the scintillator is on the top half and false otherwise.

      • getChannel

        public Integer getChannel()

      • getChannelId

        public Integer getChannelId()

      • getCrate

        public Integer getCrate()

      • getHole

        public Integer getHole()
        Gets the hole number for the channel. For scintillators that only have a single hole, this will be 0. It will otherwise be either -1 or 1.

        Static integer representation of the allowed values can be found in HOLE_LOW_X, HOLE_HIGH_X, and HOLE_NULL.
        Returns:
        Returns the hole number for the scintillator.

      • getIX

        public Integer getIX()
        Gets the x-index for the scintllator. This value ranges from 0 to 4, with higher values representing scintillators closer to the positron-side of the calorimeter.
        Returns:
        Returns the x-index as an int.

      • getIY

        public Integer getIY()
        Gets the y-index for the scintllator. This value is either -1 or 1, with the former indicating the bottom half of the hodoscope and the latter indicating the top half of the hodoscope.

        Static integer representation of the allowed values can be found in TOP and null null BOTTOM.
        Returns:
        Returns the y-index as an int.

      • getLayer

        public Integer getLayer()
        Gets the layer number (also referred to as z-index) of the scintillator. This value is either 0 for layer 1 or 1 for layer 2. Static integer representation of the allowed values can be found in LAYER_1 and LAYER_2.
        Returns:
        Returns the hodoscope layer.

      • getName

        public String getName()

      • getSlot

        public Integer getSlot()

      • getTop

        public Integer getTop()
        Specifies whether or not the scintillator is positioned on the top half of the calorimeter or not. A value of 0 means that it is not, and a value of 1 means that it is.
        Returns:
        Returns either 0 for false or 1 for true.
